alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Livingston; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lapeer, Oakland and northeastern Livingston Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Columbiaville to near Lapeer to near Goodrich to near Holly. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hadley around 615 PM EDT. Lapeer, North Branch and Ortonville around 620 PM EDT. Metamora, Clarkston and Lum around 630 PM EDT. Imlay City, Oxford, Brown City and Dryden around 640 PM EDT. Pontiac and Almont around 650 PM EDT. Troy and Rochester around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Keego Harbor, Goodland Township, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Silverwood, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. People attending Lapeer Days Festival and Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
